law.text: If any section, subsection, subdivision, paragraph, sentence, clause, or phrase of KRS 131.600 to 131.630 causes KRS 131.600 and 131.602 to no longer constitute a model statute, as it is set out in Exhibit T to the master settlement agreement, then that portion of KRS 131.600 to 131.630 shall not be valid.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 11, effective July 1, 2015. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 13, effective April 6, 2003.
